subject: Football
lead_paragraph: This could be the game for Trent Richardson to gain some traction for the Colts. Tennessee has a soft run defense, ranked 21st in the N.F.L., and has yielded the second-most rushing touchdowns.
snippet: This could be the game for Trent Richardson to gain some traction for the Colts. Tennessee has a soft run defense, ranked 21st in the N.F.L., and has yielded the second-most rushing touchdowns.
